name: Manhattan Associates, Inc.
description: Manhattan Associates, Inc. is a leading technology company specializing in supply chain and inventory optimization solutions. Founded in 1990 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, the company offers software solutions that assist businesses in managing their supply chain operations more effectively. Manhattan's core offerings include warehouse management systems, transportation management systems, and inventory optimization solutions, which integrate seamlessly with enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies such as artificial intelligence and machine learning, Manhattan Associates helps organizations streamline their operations, enhance visibility across their supply chains, and improve customer service. The company's innovative approach has made it a trusted partner for retail, wholesale distribution, and manufacturing sectors, enabling clients to achieve greater efficiency and reduce costs. Manhattan Associates is committed to continuous improvement and customer satisfaction, providing robust solutions that address the evolving needs of the marketplace. Their mission is to empower businesses to succeed in an increasingly complex and dynamic supply chain environment.

seo.meta_description: Explore Manhattan Associates, Inc., a leader in supply chain and inventory optimization technologies. Discover innovative solutions that drive efficiency and performance.

faq.answer: Manhattan Associates provides software solutions for supply chain and inventory optimization.

faq.answer: Eddie Capel is the CEO of Manhattan Associates, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Manhattan Associates headquartered?
faq.answer: Manhattan Associates is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products offered by Manhattan Associates?
faq.answer: Manhattan Associates offers Warehouse Management Systems, Transportation Management Systems, and Inventory Optimization solutions.
